str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To lay hold of, take hold of, seize (sometimes with beneficent, sometimes with hostile, intent).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Blind, physically or mentally. From, tuphoo; opaque, i.e. blind.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A hand.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To bring out, carry out, sometimes out of the city for burial; I bring forth, bear, produce. From ek and phero; to bear out.
Without, outside. Adverb from ek; out(-side, of doors), literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A village, country town. From keimai; a hamlet.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To spit. A primary verb; to spit.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
An eye. From optanomai; a sight, i.e. the eye.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To put, place upon, lay on; I add, give in addition. From epi and tithemi; to impose.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A hand.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To interrogate, question, demand of. From epi and erotao; to ask for, i.e. Inquire, seek.
